text: Stanislav Chadovich (born 24 August 1992 in Mahilyow) is a male weightlifter representing Belarus. ==Career== Chadovich won a silver at the 2014 European Weightlifting Championships for the 62kg event. In 2016, he testing positive for urine manipulation and subsequently suspended after the adverse analytical finding. ==References== ==External Links== * Profile IWF Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian male weightlifters Category:European Weightlifting Championships medalists
title: Stanislau Chadovich
